titleStmt.title: Description of The Pentateuch, provided with vowel-points and accents, masorah magna and parva.

availability.licence: This metadata, accompanying images, and the content of London, British Library, Oriental Manuscripts Or 5845: The Pentateuch, provided with vowel-points and accents, masorah magna and parva. are free of known copyright restrictions and in the public domain. notesStmt.note: Usage stains. Small rodent damage at foot.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: The Pentateuch, provided with vowel-points and accents, masorah magna and parva.

collation.p: Quires of 8 leaves each, partially marked with catchwords at the end.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Sefardi square script of the 15th century, punctuated. Avraham ben Yehoshu῾ah ha-Kohen: inscribed in the colophon, folio 185v.

binding.p: BM in-house. Spine: 'Pentateuch with Masorah Magna & Parva. Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Oriental 5845.'

history.provenance:
Acquisition:
M. Wachsler: purchased by the British Museum from him 15 October 1900: inscribed, (flyleaf [iii]v).
